SELECT cast(@num:=@num+1 AS signed integer) AS num,notice_num,notice_title,notice_content,user_id,cast(notice_date AS DATE) as notice_date FROM (SELECT @num:=(#{pageStart}/#{perPageNum})*(${perPageNum})) AS n, notice ORDER BY notice_date DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select notice_num,notice_title, notice_content, cast(notice_date AS DATE) as notice_date, notice_img1,notice_img2,notice_img3, user_id from notice where notice_num=#{notice_num}

SELECT cast(@num:=@num+1 AS signed integer) AS num,q.qna_num,qna_title,qna_img1,qna_img2,qna_img3,qna_lock,qna_content,q.user_id,qna_pw,qna_date,c.qna_comment_num FROM (SELECT @num:=(#{pageStart}/#{perPageNum})*(${perPageNum})) AS n, qna q LEFT OUTER JOIN tibetdb.qna_comment c ON q.qna_num=c.qna_num ORDER BY qna_date DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qna_num, qna_title, qna_content, qna_pw, qna_lock, qna_img1,qna_img2,qna_img3, user_id, product_num) values(#{qna_num}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_pw}, #{qna_lock}, #{qna_img1},#{qna_img2},#{qna_img3}, #{user_id}, #{product_num})
mapper.select: select qna_num,qna_pw,qna_title, qna_content, cast(qna_date AS DATE) as qna_date, qna_img1,qna_img2,qna_img3, user_id from tibetdb.qna where qna_num=#{qna_num}
mapper.update: update tibetdb.qna set qna_content=#{qna_content}, qna_lock=#{qna_lock},qna_pw=#{qna_pw},qna_img1=#{qna_img1},qna_img2=#{qna_img2},qna_img3=#{qna_img3},qna_date=NOW() where qna_num=#{qna_num}
